post:
Why to choose a VPS from QHoster.com:

- 1Gbit/s connected servers
- RAID-10 HDD array for fastest disk I/O
- Always Intel Xeon Processors
- Highly secured and well maintained Supermicro and HP servers
- Registered company unlike some budget VPS hosting providers
- cPanel, Plesk and other control panels including security setup during provisioning
- Full root access
- Free and Instant VPS setup
- Custom Reverse DNS (RDNS) records
- Free migration of your data from your current hosting provider


Xen/Xen-HVM Virtual Private Server
=====================================
2 CPU cores
1024 MB RAM
2048 MB Swap
40 GB Disk space (Raid-10)
2000 GB Monthly traffic (1Gbits port)

Full Root access
1 IP address
32 & 64 bit OSes : CentOS 5 & 6 / Fedora 14 & 15 & 16 / Debian 5 & 6/ Ubuntu 10 & 11 & 12 / ArchLinux / Slackware / Gentoo / Scientific Linux 6 and FreeBSD/OpenBSD/NetBSD & Windows 7 and Server 2008 Enterprise


Order now only for : $19.98/mo. (recurring price) ORDER NOW

ONLY 10 VPSes are available, 5 Windows 2008 Enterprise updated ready to go ...

FAQ:

Q: Do you offer cPanel, Plesk, Fantastico, RVSkins and other hosting control panels and auto-installers?
A: Yes. We offer all hosting software like control panels (cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, InterWorx, ISPManager, Kloxo), sitebuiders (RVSIteBuilder, Trendy Flash Builder, Parallels SiteBuilder), auto-installers (Softaculous, Fantastico, Installatron).

Q: What port speeds are included with the VPS?
A: 1Gbits port speed for the VPSes.

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card, AlertPay (Payza), Skrill (MoneyBookers), Liberty Reserve

Q: What is your average setup time?
A: All VPSes are setup instantly so you do not need to wait.

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2004.

Q: Do you allow proxy sites?
A: We allow private proxy sites. We do not permit public proxy sites.

Q: Can we setup OpenVPN with VPS server?
A: Yes all servers have OpenVPN, PPTP and L2TP/IPSec support.

Q: Do you offer Reverse-DNS control?
A: Yes you can modify the RDNS for your IP address/es.

Q: Do you make backups of all VPSes?
A: We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours in case of hardware problem.

Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data?
A: Sure, we always help customers to transfer their existing data (VPSes with cPanel and Plesk) from another provider without a fee.
